short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to face recognition actors on the internet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the ultimate streaming experience with X-Ray Everywhere, the browser extension that brings the power of X-Ray feature to any streaming platform and webpage!

Ever wished you could access detailed information about the actors, while watching your favorite shows and movies? Now you can! With X-Ray Everywhere, dive deeper into the content you love, whether you're binge-watching on Netflix, Hulu, Disney+, or any other streaming service.

Key Features:

Seamless Integration: Enjoy the convenience of X-Ray feature across multiple streaming platforms and webpages.
Actor & Character Details: Get instant access to information about the actors on screen and the characters they portray.
Customizable Settings: Tailor the extension to suit your preferences with adjustable display options and settings.

Don't miss out on the immersive experience offered by X-Ray Everywhere. Elevate your streaming sessions and unlock a whole new level of enjoyment today!

This is beta version, any suggestion or bug report is welcome: brunopjsw@gmail.com
